duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and oversee SaaS client implementations and internal and external projects.
Manage the lifecycle of SaaS implementations from beginning to end, including developing implementation plans, leading meetings, and ensuring tasks are completed on time.
Conduct needs assessment with clients to understand their program needs, identify gaps, and determine appropriate project timelines.
Serve as the main point of contact for clients, workstream leads, and project support throughout the implementation and post-implementation.
Develop efficient processes to support ongoing client management and prepare training materials for client training.
Work with the IT Project Team to manage business deliverables such as requirements gathering and user acceptance testing.
Evaluate client escalations and requests related to system and IT issues.
Maintain a positive working relationship with all departments and contribute to fostering a positive work environment.
May provide additional project support for various projects involving the Implementation and Development Team.

education_certification.credential: 2-3 years of case management experience in FMLA, STD and ADA
